name: AI & LLM Research Network
description: The key researchers, organizations, and works of the modern AI/LLM revolution (2012-present), including OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepMind, Meta AI, and the academic pioneers who trained them.
author: HistoryNet AI Agent

customRelationshipTypes.description: Person co-founded an entity/organization with others
Source recruited target to an organization

notes: Chinese AI researchers and labs are explicitly excluded from this dataset due to scope decisions. Hardware engineers are also excluded. This network captures the Western AI research ecosystem.
